proud to offer diverse academic programs for our students and families.

span.style: line-height: 20px; text-align: justify; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

br.span: While each school site is unique, there is the core, overarching mission that every student will grow as a thinker, problem solver, and communicator to pursue a future without limits.

br.br: A Treasure Hunter is a caring adult committed to searching for all talents, intelligence and skills that exist in all children and youth. All children are capable of success...no exceptions!

hr.span: In this video our Superintendent, Dr. Betsy Hargrove, explains just one way that we promote Kids at Hope and live as Treasure Hunters every day! Click here to learn more.
